titleStmt.title: A paraphrase and commentary upon all the epistles of the New Testament By Daniel Whitby, D.D. and chantor of the church of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Whitby, Daniel, 1638-1726.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W. Bowyer, for Awnsham and John Churchill, at the Black Swan in Pater-Noster-Row,

notesStmt.note: "A treatise of the true millenium" has divisional title page; register and pagination are continuous.
With a table and two final index leaves.
Text and register appear continuous despite pagination.
Imperfect: tightly bound with some print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
